item.title: Create a Data Marvel with Spring Data Neo4j
item.description: Photo by Genessa Panainte on Unsplash I have had a couple of Github projects demonstrating bits of functionality for Spring Data Neo4j, but they had last been updated in 2020 when the new Spring Data Neo4j 6 was still a beta version known as SDN/RX. Since there have been several changes since then, I thought I would give the projects a refresh and make them current. Project code:
